docs.title: About Refreryo's Revolution
docs.text: Refreryo's Revolution is a collection of Discord bots designed to enhance your server experience. Our mission is to provide reliable, easy-to-use, and feature-rich bots that help server owners and moderators manage their communities effectively.

docs.title: The Developer
docs.text: Refreryo's Revolution bots are developed and maintained by Refreryo, a passionate programmer with a focus on creating useful tools for Discord communities.

docs.title: Technology
docs.text:
Our bots are built using:

  • Java JDA
  • MongoDB for data storage
  • Hosted on reliable cloud infrastructure

docs.title: Contributing
docs.text:
Interested in contributing to our projects?

  • Check out our GitHub repository
  • Join our Discord server for discussions

docs.title: Privacy & Terms
docs.text:
• We collect minimal data necessary for bot functionality
  • User data is never sold, shared with third parties or other companies

docs.title: Privacy Policy
docs.text:
We collect only the minimal data required to improve your experience and ensure the proper functioning of our bots. No additional data is collected, stored, or sold to third parties. Your privacy is our priority.

Thank you for your interest in Refreryo's Revolution!

docs.title: Feature Comparison
docs.text: Feature Green Dino Aviator Shark Byte Basic moderation commands ✓ 🛠️ ✓ Advanced moderation tools ✓ ✗ ✓ Fun commands ✓ ✓ ✗ Custom commands ✓ ✗ ✗ Reaction roles ✗ ✗ ✗ Server statistics ✓ ✗ ✓ Logging system ✓ ✗ ✗ Welcome messages ✓ 🛠️ ✗ News / Announcer ✓ ✗ ✗ Advaned Blacklist ✓ ✗ ✗

docs.title: Legend
docs.text: ✓ Available          🔜 Planned          ✗ Not available          🛠️ Work in Progress          ℹ️ Paused

docs.title: Support
docs.text: Need help with our Discord bots? You're in the right place!

docs.title: Quick Support
docs.text:
If you're having trouble with one of our bots, here are some quick steps to try:

  1. Make sure the bot has the necessary permissions in your server
  2. Check that you're using the commands correctly (see our Command Reference)
  3. Try kicking and re-inviting the bot if it's not responding

docs.title: Bot not responding to commands?
docs.text:
• Ensure the bot is online
  • Check if the bot has permission to see and send messages in the channel
  • Make sure you're using the correct prefix (Slash commands start with /)

docs.title: Missing features?
docs.text: You can suggest new commands or features directly on our Discord server—just let us know what you'd like to see!

docs.title: Contact Us
docs.text:
If you need further assistance, you can reach us through:

  • Discord Server: Join our support server
  • Discord DM: Contact refreryo on Discord
  • GitHub Issues: Create an issue for bug reports

docs.title: Feature Requests
docs.text:
Have an idea for a new feature? We'd love to hear it!

  • Join our Discord server and post in the #suggestions channel
  • Create a GitHub issue with the "Enhancement" label

We typically respond to support requests within 24-48 hours or more - this depends on the timezone.

docs.title: Aviator Changelog
docs.text:
Stay up to date with the latest updates and improvements to our Aviator Discord Bot.

1.0.0 | Release @ June 10, 2025

✈️ Version 1.0.0 – Release

🛫 Bot Version
  • 1.0.0 (Released)
📢 Notes
  • Having issues? Create a GitHub Issue
  • Feedback & suggestions are welcome!
Aviator is released! Please note that some API commands are paid. If you have suggestions, feel free to join my Discord server.

docs.title: DinoByte Changelog
docs.text:
Follow the development progress of our DinoByte Discord bot.

Please take note, that DinoByte will not be released soon, current and main development is set to Green Dino.

For more information, please see DinoByte Project

docs.title: Green Dino Changelog
docs.text: Stay up to date with the latest updates and improvements to our Green Dino Discord Bot.

docs.title: Version 1.9.0
docs.text:
1.9.0 | Stable @ June 16, 2025

🦖 Version 1.9.0

✏️ Improvements
  • Fixed various bugs to enhance overall stability and performance
  • Refined and expanded user commands for a smoother experience
  • Added new commands to /advanced-blacklist
📢 Notes
  • Encountering issues? Open a GitHub Issue
  • Your feedback and suggestions are always appreciated!
Small Outage: Database connection outage [current - June @ 20, 2025]

docs.title: Version 1.8.9
docs.text:
1.8.9 | Stable @ June 16, 2025

🦖 Version 1.8.9 – STABLE

✏️ Improvements
  • Fixed various bugs to enhance overall stability and performance
  • Refined and expanded user commands for a smoother experience
  • Further stabilized command handling and event listeners
  • Improved startup behavior for faster and more reliable bot initialization *1
  • Updated and optimized additional user commands
🌍 Bot Version
  • 1.8.9 (Stable)
📢 Notes
  • *1 Includes changes to BotConfig for improved configuration management
  • Encountering issues? Open a GitHub Issue
  • Your feedback and suggestions are always appreciated!
Minor changes and general improvements have been made to ensure a better user experience.

docs.title: Version 1.8.8
docs.text:
1.8.8 | Stable @ May 23, 2025

🦖 Version 1.8.8 – STABLE

✏️ Improvements
  • Optimized AFK system & moderation
  • Reworked blackjack logic and statistics
  • Stabilized command handling & listeners
  • Improved startup behavior and logging
  • Updated more user commands
🌍 Bot Version
  • 1.8.8 (Stable)
📢 Notes
  • Encountering issues? Open a GitHub Issue
  • Your feedback and suggestions are always appreciated!
Thank you for your support – together we make Green Dino better!

docs.title: Shark Byte Changelog
docs.text:
Stay up to date with the latest updates and improvements to our Shark Byte Discord Bot.

1.0.0 | Release @ June 10, 2025

🦈 Version 1.0.0 – Release

🌊 Bot Version
  • 1.0.0 (Released)
📢 Notes
  • Shark Byte has just been released! Discover what the bot is capable of.
  • Having issues? Create a GitHub Issue
  • Feedback & suggestions are welcome!
Thank you for your early support – together we make Shark Byte better! Please note that some features may be expanded in future updates. If you have suggestions, feel free to join our Discord server.

docs.title: Command Reference
docs.text: This page lists all available commands for our Discord bots.

docs.title: 👤 User Commands
docs.text: Slash Command Description Info /afk Set your status to AFK with a custom reason. The bot will notify others that you're currently away. /help Displays a list of available commands. Browse through all available commands and features. /serverstats View server-related statistics. Displays information such as server region, roles, bots, and more. /support Get support for Green Dino. Encountering issues? Use this command for help.

docs.title: 🕹️ Games
docs.text:
Slash Command Description /blackjack start Start a new blackjack game. /blackjack stop Stop your current blackjack session. /blackjack stats View your blackjack game statistics. /blackjack balance Check your current in-game balance. Slash Command Description Info /pet-create Create your own virtual pet. Choose between a Dino, Dog, or Cat. /pet-mypet Display your pet’s current status. View your pet’s level and needs. /pet-play Play with your pet to earn XP. Strengthen your bond and have fun. /pet-feed Feed your pet to reduce its hunger. Keep your pet happy and satisfied. /pet-sleep Let your pet sleep to regain energy. Rest is essential for activities. /pet-delete Permanently delete your virtual pet. This action is irreversible.

⚠️ Virtual Pet Warning

If you neglect your pet’s needs, it may leave you. Please take care of your pet regularly!

docs.title: ⭐ Extras
docs.text: Slash Command Description Info /pw-gen Generate a secure password via a modal dialog. Works with unique IDs. /pw-list View a list of all your saved passwords. Works with unique IDs. /pw-delete Remove a stored password. Works with unique IDs. Slash Command Description /coinflip Flip a coin (heads or tails). /dadjoke Receive a random dad joke. /8ball Ask the magic 8-ball a question. /rollthedice Roll a die with your chosen number of sides. /rps Play Rock, Paper, Scissors!

docs.title: 🚨 Moderation
docs.text:
Slash Command Description /clear Delete a specified number of messages [1 - 1000].

More moderation commands are currently in development.

docs.title: 🛠️ Utilities
docs.text: Slash Command Description /create-structure Set up the initial server structure. /delete-structure Remove the default server structure. /create-welcome Create a new welcome channel. /set-welcome Assign an existing channel as the welcome channel. /del-welcome Remove the welcome channel configuration.

docs.title: 🦕 DinoByte Commands
docs.text: Please take note, that DinoByte will not be released soon, current and main development is set to Green Dino. For more information, please see DinoByte Project

docs.title: ⚡ Note
docs.text:
Commands marked as WIP are still being developed and may not be fully functional yet.

This command list is still being updated. Check back soon for more commands!

If you have any suggestions for new commands, feel free to reach out to us on Discord!

Take note, all commands are still not finished, see discords auto-complete manager!

docs.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
docs.text: Welcome to the FAQ for our three Discord bots: Green Dino, Shark Byte, and Aviator! Here you’ll find answers to common questions, interactive features, and direct links to each bot’s page.

docs.title: Table of Contents
docs.text:
1. General Questions
  2. Green Dino
  3. Shark Byte
  4. Aviator
  5. Support

docs.title: ✨ How to Use
docs.text:
• Navigate: Use the Table of Contents for animated section jumps.
  • Expand: Click any question to reveal its answer.
  • Invite Bots: Use the buttons to visit or invite each bot.

docs.title: General Questions
docs.text: What are Discord bots?              Discord bots are automated programs that add features and moderation to your server.          How do I add a bot to my server?              Click the invite button for your chosen bot below and authorize it for your server.

docs.title: 🦖 Green Dino
docs.text:
Green Dino is your friendly moderation and utility bot.

What features does Green Dino offer? - Moderation-tools - User & Admin Commands - Welcome messages & configuration - Games and other Utils - Bot-Structure - Advanced Blacklist How do I configure Green Dino? Use the /help command to get started

🦖 Invite Green Dino

docs.title: 🦈 Shark Byte
docs.text:
Shark Byte brings moderations and small security features and basic commands to your server.

What is included? - Moderation - Serverstats - Info-commands How do I use the commands? Use /help followed by the command name

🦈 Invite Shark Byte Page

docs.title: 🛩️ Aviator
docs.text:
Aviator small fun and entertaining bot.

How can Aviator entertain my server and members? - Airports- - Planes- - Weather- - Time zone support- - Commands Is a API included? Yes. But some APIs costs money, and Aviator runs on a free plan. But maybe in the future there will be more usable commands and a better functionality for the Bot.

🛩️ Invite Aviator Page

docs.title: 🐶 ModMops
docs.text:
ModMops is a small german (only) side-project for small- medium sized community-servers.

What features does Green Dino offer? - Moderation-tools - User & Admin Commands - Welcome messages & configuration - Games and other Utils - Config-Settings - Blacklist function How do I configure ModMops? Use the /help command to get started

🐶 Invite ModMops

Hinweis

[GER] ModMops ist nur auf Deutsch verfügbar und erhält sehr, sehr niedrige Priorität sowie minimalen Support. [ENG] ModMops is only available in German and receives very low priority and minimal support.

docs.title: Support
docs.text: Need help? Join our Support Server or check each bot’s page for documentation.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: 🦖 Green Dino Fun & Utility Bot Invite ✈️ Aviator Fun / Tools & Planes Invite 🦈 Shark Byte Small / Moderation & Simple+ Invite 🐶 ModMops Moderation & Utility Bot Invite « » Click on the Invite-Button to get startet with a discord bot!

docs.title: Projects
docs.text:
Explore our Discord bots designed to enhance your server experience

Green Dino

A comprehensive Discord bot with advanced features for larger servers.

Version: 1.9.0

Learn More Aviator

Mediumsize Bot for users who like to check airports and airplanes and more

Status: 1.0.0

Learn More Shark Byte

A small moderation and fun bot for Discord, perfect for small to medium communities.

Status: 1.0.0

Learn More 🐶 ModMops

Moderation & Utility Bot

Version: 0.3

Invite

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: Want to try our bots? Check out the setup guides to get started in minutes!

docs.title: Support
docs.text: Having issues or questions? Visit our support page for assistance.

docs.title: - Why "Aviator"?
docs.text:
• Aviator is the next generation I wanted to create.
  • It is small currently, but will be up in the skys!

docs.title: - How does Aviator work?
docs.text:
• Aviator is developed using JDA (Java Discord API).
  • Some core features are backed by a database for performance and persistence.

docs.title: - Invite the Bot
docs.text:
1. Click the link: Invite Aviator
  2. Choose the server where you want to add the bot
  3. Review the requested permissions and click Authorize

docs.title: - First Commands
docs.text:
• /help - Shows all currently working commands
  • /info - Shows information about the bot
  • /ping - API ping response time

docs.title: Last Words
docs.text:
Aviator will not be the same as Green Dino but there will be act almost the same. I’ve put a lot of heart into it, and I’m thrilled to see it being used by others in action.

Your support means a lot. Whether you're just testing commands or building a whole server around it — thank you!

Let’s see where the journey goes next ✈️✨

docs.title: 🦕 DinoByte
docs.text: PAUSED

docs.title: ⚠️ Information!
docs.text: This page is currently under construction, as DinoByte is still in the very early stages of development. That means no commands are listed here yet — but you can track progress and upcoming features in the Feature Comparison tab.

docs.title: Why "Green Dino"?
docs.text:
• Green Dino is one of my first and most ambitious projects.
  • It began as a simple design idea and has evolved into a powerful, feature-rich Discord bot.

docs.title: How does Green Dino work?
docs.text:
• Built with JDA (Java Discord API) for seamless Discord integration.
  • Uses a robust database for fast performance and reliable data storage.

docs.title: Invite the Bot
docs.text:
1. Invite Green Dino
  2. Choose your server
  3. Review permissions and click Authorize

docs.title: 👤 User Commands
docs.text: Slash Command Description Info /afk Set your status to AFK with a custom reason. Notifies others that you're currently away. /help Shows a list of available commands. Browse all commands and features. /serverstats View server statistics. See region, roles, bots, and more. /support Get support for Green Dino. Need help? Use this command.

docs.title: 🕹️ Games
docs.text: Slash Command Description /blackjack Start a new blackjack session.

docs.title: 🐾 Virtual Pet System
docs.text:
Slash Command Description Info /pet-create Create your own virtual pet. Choose between Dino, Dog, or Cat. /pet-mypet Show your pet’s current status. View your pet’s level and needs. /pet-play Play with your pet to earn XP. Strengthen your bond and have fun. /pet-feed Feed your pet to reduce hunger. Keep your pet happy and satisfied. /pet-sleep Let your pet sleep to regain energy. Rest is essential for activities. /pet-delete Permanently delete your virtual pet. This action cannot be undone.

⚠️ Virtual Pet Warning If you neglect your pet’s needs, it may leave you. Please take care of your pet regularly!

docs.title: ⭐ Extras
docs.text: Slash Command Description Info /pw-gen Generate a secure password via a modal dialog. Works with unique IDs. /pw-list View all your saved passwords. Works with unique IDs. /pw-delete Remove a stored password. Works with unique IDs. Slash Command Description /coinflip Flip a coin (heads or tails). /dadjoke Get a random dad joke. /8ball Ask the magic 8-ball a question. /rollthedice Roll a die with your chosen number of sides. /rps Play Rock, Paper, Scissors!

docs.title: 🚨 Moderation [Update 1.9.0]
docs.text: Slash Command Description /clear Delete a specified number of messages [1-1000]. /ban Kick a user from the server. /kick Kick a user from the server. /warn Warning actions with sub-commands. /advanced-blacklist add Add user to blacklist with sec. level /advanced-blacklist clear Clear blacklist from your server /advanced-blacklist info Get detailed info about a blacklisted user /advanced-blacklist list Show all users in the blacklist entry /advanced-blacklist remove Remove a user from the blacklist /advanced-blacklist set_logchannel Set the channel for the blacklist logs /advanced-blacklist stats Show advanced stats /advanced-blacklist update Update the security level of a blacklisted user

docs.title: 🛠️ Utilities
docs.text: Slash Command Description /create-structure Set up the initial server structure. /delete-structure Remove the default server structure. /create-welcome Create a new welcome channel. /set-welcome Assign an existing channel as the welcome channel. /del-welcome Remove the welcome channel configuration.

docs.title: Functionality & Additional Info
docs.text:
Green Dino is a continuously evolving project with a wide range of features. While it's stable and packed with functionality, you might occasionally encounter minor bugs.

I'm always working on improvements and new features. Your feedback is highly appreciated!

Need help or want to report a bug? - Join the support server - Open an issue on GitHub

docs.title: 🦖✨ Final Words
docs.text:
Green Dino started as a fun experiment and has grown into a project I'm truly proud of. Thank you for your support—whether you're just trying out commands or building your community with Green Dino!

Let's see where the journey goes next

docs.title: Info
docs.text:
Please read to proceed | Bitte lesen bevor dem fortfahren

ModMops Info Deutsch: Dieser Discord-Bot wurde als kleines Nebenprojekt entwickelt und ist ausschließlich auf Deutsch verfügbar. English: This Discord bot was developed as a small side project and is only available in German.

docs.title: ℹ️ Informationen
docs.text:
Der Discord Bot wurde für kleine Projekte geschrieben.

Der Bot erhält keine großen Updates mehr, sondern nur noch Fehlerbehebungen und kleinere Anpassungen.

Die Priorität liegt auf anderen Projekten (siehe linke Seite – nur auf Englisch verfügbar).

Projekt-Updates werden nur auf dieser Seite angezeigt und nicht im Changelog.

docs.title: 📄 Befehle
docs.text: Befehle funktionieren großteils nur mit Slashcommands | /help

docs.title: └ AdminCommands
docs.text:
/ban            [user]      [grund]
/purge          [amount]    [delete_older]   *[user]
/timeout        [user]      [dauer]           [grund]
/warn           [user]      [grund]

/welcome        [channel | message | toggle ]
/config         [reset   | set     | view   ]
/blacklist      [add     | clear   | remove ]
*Purge besitzt die Funktion die Nachrichten eines Users zu löschen.

docs.title: └ UserCommands <sup>*1/2</sup>
docs.text:
/ping
/serverinfo
/userinfo       [user]

/rps            [user]
/tictactoe      [user]
/quiz           [Kategorie]

docs.title: ⚙️ Funktionen
docs.text:
ModMops bietet zahlreiche serverseitige Funktionen für Discord-Server. Die Standardeinstellungen sind für die meisten Anwendungsfälle ausreichend.

Die Blacklist-Funktion arbeitet nur auf einzelnen Servern und nicht serverübergreifend.

Wie du diese Funktionen nutzt, erfährst du mit dem Befehl /help.

docs.title: 👾 Support
docs.text:
Du kannst über GitHub ein Ticket erstellen und den Fehler beschreiben.

Alternativ kannst du dem Discord-Server beitreten und dein Problem dort schildern. (Siehe Footer der Website und klicke auf das Discord-Symbol.)

docs.title: ⚡ Quick-Link
docs.text:
⚡ Quick-Link
  • Probleme entdeckt? Erstelle ein GitHub-Issue
  • Trete dem Offiziellen Discord bei.
  • Dein Feedback und deine Vorschläge sind jederzeit willkommen!

docs.title: Version 0.3
docs.text:
0.3 | Update @ 18. Juni 2025

🐶 Version 0.3 – Update

✏️ Änderungen / Problembehandlung
  • Fehler des Commands: /quiz /tictactoe /rps wurde behoben
  • Button-ID Fehler behoben
  • Pruge besitzt die Funktion um ältere Nachrichten zu löschen (Discord max löschbaren Nachrichten älter als 2 Wochen)
  • Minimale Bugs sind noch vorhanden*1

docs.title: Version 0.2
docs.text:
0.2 | Update @ 18. Juni 2025

🐶 Version 0.2 – Update

✏️ Änderungen / Problembehandlung
  • Fehler des Commands: /help wurde behoben
  • Funktionen wurden angepasst und sind nun besser nutzbar
  • Pruge besitzt die Funktion um ältere Nachrichten zu löschen (Discord max löschbaren Nachrichten älter als 2 Wochen)
  • Einige Bugs sind noch vorhanden*1

docs.title: Version 0.1
docs.text:
0.1 | Veröffentlichung @ 16. Juni 2025

🐶 Version 0.1 – Veröffentlichung

✏️ Veröffentlichungsinfo
  • Der Bot beinhaltet die Moderationsfunktion von Discord & kann auch mit eigenen Einstellungen arbeiten
  • Einige Bugs sind noch vorhanden*1
*1Funktionen wie der /help funktionieren noch nicht vollständig, nutze bitte die eingebaute build-in Funktion von Discord um die Commands zu sehen. *2Darunter Funktionieren die UserCommands auch nicht vollständig - können aber dennoch genutzt werden mit minimalen kleinen Fehlern.

docs.title: 🦈 Shark Byte
docs.text: Stable Release

docs.title: - Why "Shark Byte"?
docs.text:
• Shark Byte is a simple moderation bot
  • It is a small Bot for small - medium size servers

docs.title: - How does Shark Byte work?
docs.text: • Aviator is developed using JDA (Java Discord API).

docs.title: - Invite the Bot
docs.text:
1. Click the link: Invite Shark Byte
  2. Choose the server where you want to add the bot
  3. Review the requested permissions and click Authorize

docs.title: First Command
docs.text: /help - Shows all currently working commands with categorys and works with buttons

docs.title: System
docs.text:
Shark Byte Command System

Shark Byte works with both System commands - which means you can use Text-Commands and Slash-Commands.
